Part D: Employment and Education

We are interested in your experiences with education and employment. In the following 10 questions please select the choice that best describes you or your experiences, and fill in the blank spaces where they are provided.

Enter your Participant ID

1. What types of post-secondary courses have you taken anywhere? (Indicate Yes or No for each type.)
No Yes Print-based correspondence, if yes then how many?
No Yes Evening Lecture course, if yes then how many?
No Yes Block course (2 to 5 full days), if yes then how many?
No Yes A course which uses computers in the delivery of any of its contents, if yes then how many?

No Yes Floppy Diskettes
